T02D2040:140a-1: pra bha wa dha ris'a dha nam /
T02D2040:140a-4: bdud rtsi'i mnga' bdag bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2040:140a-5: gang zhig kha zas nyung ba yis //
T02D2040:140a-6: 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis ngos na //
T02D2040:140a-7: som nyi bza' bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2040:140a-8: ting nge 'dzin gyi bcud len bshad //
T02D2040:140a-9: gsum la skyabs song byang chub sems //
T02D2040:140b-0: gnas bzhi la sogs @140b sngon song bas //
T02D2040:140b-1: skad cig nyid las yul rnams dang //
T02D2040:140b-2: yul can stong pa'i ngang nyid las //
T02D2040:140b-3: pam las mtsho skyes dbus son pa'i //
T02D2040:140b-4: nyi ma'i dbus su lha mo ni //
T02D2040:140b-5: chu shel lta bu gri gug dang //
T02D2040:140b-6: bdud rtsi'i bum pa g-yas dang g-yon //
T02D2040:140b-7: dar dkar gos dang rin chen rgyan //
T02D2040:140b-8: lang tsho rgyas shing sha rgyas ma //
T02D2040:140b-9: li ba'i skra dang bung ba'i dri //
T02D2040:140b-10: mdzes ldan ma yi brang dbus su //
T02D2040:140b-11: rang dang 'dra ba'i lha mo ni //
T02D2040:140b-12: dangs pa'i shel drung mu tig ltar //
T02D2040:140b-14: de nas rang snying shing 'bras ltar //
T02D2040:140b-15: rtsi mo gyen ltar rtsa lta dang //
T02D2040:140b-16: bcas pa phyed nas mtshon gyis gcad //
T02D2040:140b-17: steng gi phyogs ni sangs rgyas lha'i //
T02D2040:140b-18: rtsa dang bcas te ltos med dbul //
T02D2040:140b-19: nyon mongs lha yi rtsa sbubs nas //
T02D2040:140b-20: dri ma ma lus bshang lam nas //
T02D2040:140b-21: 'thon te rgya mtsho'i ngogs su bskur //
T02D2040:140b-22: rtsa stong bum pa'i bdud rtsis bkang //
T02D2040:140b-23: lus dang rtsa dang khams bdud rtsi //
T02D2040:140b-24: ye shes rgyal po'i rlung rgyas te //
T02D2040:140b-25: phru ma mar gyis gang ba ltar //
T02D2040:140b-26: rang gi lus dang de bzhin sems //
T02D2040:140b-27: zag med bde bas rab rgyas te //
T02D2040:140b-28: dmigs shing spros pa bcad pa yis //
T02D2040:140b-29: ting nge 'dzin la gtad de gzhag / de ltar yang yang goms pa yis //
T02D2040:140b-32: de don bya phyir gsang sngags dang //
T02D2040:140b-33: smon lam che la 'bad par bya //
T02D2040:140b-34: de ltar brten na zag med kyi //
T02D2040:140b-35: ting 'dzin mchog ni skye ba dang //
T02D2040:140b-36: gnyid rmugs la sogs byed pa'i zas //
T02D2040:140b-37: til tsam dgos par mi 'gyur ba'i //
T02D2040:140b-38: skra dkar gnyer ma spong ba dang //
T02D2040:140b-39: lus rgyas dangs shing sha stobs rgyas //
T02D2040:140b-41: dus min 'chi bas mi gos te //
T02D2040:140b-45: ci 'dod dam pa'i mchog ster te //
T02D2040:140b-46: 'dod sred ma lus rab bcad nas //
T02D2040:140b-48: de ltar bla mas gnang ba yi //
T02D2040:140b-49: man ngag gsal la nongs mchis rnams //
T02D2040:140b-50: bzod par gnang zhing de yi ni //
T02D2040:140b-51: dge bas gshin rje gshed gyur cig /'od 'chang ma'i
T02D2040:141a-0: sgrub thabs ting nge 'dzin gyi bcud len @141a *
T02D2040:141a-1: // gyi man ngag ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2040:141a-4: 'di'i man ngag gcig sngar yang snyan brgyud du byung 'dug ste /
